author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Changed path factory to append URI fragment to the path, if available.
- Re-generated Litmus client tests without lock plugin to reflect recent fixes.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Changed handling of DOMDocument creation, new method throws an exception now
on failure, which contains the libxml error information.
- Fixed 2 Litmus tests which we accepted to fail before.
# These are checking for incorrect XML problems.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed error code on MKCOL, if parent collection does not exist.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Updated lock error behavior to RFC 4918.
- Unified RFC lock client tests to use example.com as the host.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Added updated WebDAV RFC 4918 to design directory.
